reviewText: Five stars for anything Little Bear!  I've bought it for my granddaughters, and they watch it over and over again, just like their Mom watched Little Bear on TV when she was young.  Precious stories told calmly and quietly.
I love Little Bear, I own every single one ever made and the new releases, this is the Canada Release and the American one is called Rainy Day Tales, cheapr

I love the Little Bear stuff because it is quiet and sweet and the perfect little program to end a busy day with your child. Little bear comes from a loving family and has all sorts of adventures OUTSIDE with his animal friends and he is not a fresh boy with wise cracks spilling out of his mouth. My grandchildren love him and I find him refreshing.
The toddler and her sister really enjoy it!  Nice for those times when you want a quiet activity for them.
